headline.main: SPY PROSECUTION NEARS END OF CASE; Defendant Accused of Getting Confidential FBI Pamphlet

lead_paragraph: The government moved toward completion of its case yesterday in the Brooklyn espionage trial with the presentation of evidence designed to link Leo Waalen, one of the defendants, with a Nazi spy ring that operated in this country for more than sixteen months.
abstract: evidence linking Waalen with FBI pamphlet and Sebold presented
